Name: Celestite SrSO_4
Type: Mineral
Class: Sulfates
Subclass: 
Particle Size: 125-500um
Sample No.: SO-5A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, Utah, Emery County
Collected by Grieger's Inc.
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: so05aa.txt
